meta.name: description
meta.value: Asks the user to confirm the message

parameter.name: recipients
parameter.description: Message recipients. Empty if message is sent to a named group

parameter.name: groupName
parameter.description: Group name. Set if message is being sent to a named group

parameter.name: app
parameter.description: The app used to send the message

parameter.name: reply
parameter.description: Indicates that the message to be sent is a reply

parameter.name: currentLocationAttachment
parameter.description: Indicates that message contains a current location attachment

parameter.name: outgoingMessageType
parameter.description: The type of message (audio or text). See INOutgoingMessageType.typeValue
